assets.subtitle: 25th Anniversary Show

assets.biography: From an acoustic trio to one of the most successful German rock bands. From an idea, hard work, unwavering faith to several Top 10 and three No. 1 albums. To sold-out tours, quaking castles and most loyal fans all over the world. From the latest album "Kompass zur Sonne" and many more milestones: In Extremo take it to the next level! For a fabulous quarter of a century, the band has now fascinated with its rousing energy, which - in perfection! - arises from this very own mixture: Between historical influences and the powerful sound of their metal guitars, between medieval instruments, folkloric-archaic as well as modern rhythms, sing-along anthems in German and dialect, between pure full throttle and goosebump melodies, so much more than music is created. It is an atmosphere, a feeling, a connection that makes them as unique as they are successful.

Since two decades they are touring the world, released eight studio albums and bandleader Maria Gabriel crowned the artistry with a tribute album to all female-fronted Heavy Metal bands in the 80s. Right on time to the release of their ninth longplayer „The Silver Key“ in summer 2024 the quartet from Poland will shake some dust on the Holy Ground for the first time.

For nearly a decade, Butcher Babies have been crushing stages worldwide with their vicious live performance and explosive energy. Their stage presence is a hypnotic spectacle that leaves audiences hungry for more. Frontwomen Heidi Shepherd and Carla Harvey, guitarist Henry Flury, bassist Jason Klein and drummer Chase Brickenden juxtapose brutal, aggressive riffs with beautiful melodies that wail with emotional redemption.

Hailing from the City Of Angels, Butcher Babies aided in the jubilant revival of the Metal scene on the Sunset Strip. While gaining attention from several record labels the band signed a worldwide deal with Century Media Records in December 2012. Less than a year later, July 2013, they released their debut album GOLIATH, produced by Josh Wilbur (Gojira, Lamb of God, Hatebreed). Followed by their highly anticipated sophomore headbanger, TAKE IT LIKE A MAN, August 2015, produced by Logan Mader (FFDP, Gojira, Soulfly).
The evolution continues as the band is set to release their third full studio album, October 27, 2017, LILITH, produced by Steve Evetts (Suicide Silence, Dillinger Escape Plan, The Cure).

With three albums and two EPs under their belt, Butcher Babies have reached a new level of maturity solidifying a triumphant return after a brief creative hiatus to write and rebuild. LILITH opens with a kick right to the teeth with the aggressive Burn the Straw Man, then drips with sensuality on tracks like Headspin and The Huntsman, pairing riveting guitars with velvet vocal harmonies. This album runs the gamut between exploring the dark roots of lust and the high energy thrash hijinks that Butcher Babies have become known and loved for.

Butcher Babies have toured relentlessly among the likes of Megadeth, Rob Zombie, Marilyn Manson, Five Finger Death Punch, Danzig, In This Moment, Cradle of Filth, Black Label Society, etc; played music fests including Mayhem, Download (UK), Hellfest (France), Knotfest (US & Japan), Hell and Heaven(Mexico), Rock on The Range, Louder Than Life, Aftershock, Welcome to Rockville, etc. and appeared in the film Alleluia! : The Devils Carnival.

Butcher Babies is an American heavy metal band from Los Angeles, California, consisting of frontwomen Heidi Shepherd and Carla Harvey, guitarist Henry Flury, bassist Ricky Bonazza, and drummer Chase Brickenden.

In the City of Angels, right on the Sunset Strip in LA, it's still business as usual: sex, drugs and rock'n'roll everyday! With two singers Carla Harvey and Heidi Shepherd, who with reasons also worked as presenter for the Playboy channel, BUTCHER BABIES are not only damn hot, but also fire off modern thrash fireworks live. With their new album "Eye for an Eye" aggressive riffs with beautiful melodies that wail with emotional redemption awaits us!

Girlschool are a heavy metal band originating from the New Wave of British Heavy Metal Scene in 1978 and frequently associated with contemporaries and friends Motörhead. They are the longest running all-female rock band from the UK. Still active and looking good after more than 35 years. Formed from a school band called Painted Lady by Kim McAuliffe and Enid Williams. Girlschool enjoyed strong media exposure and commercial success in the uk in the early 1980s with three albums of 'punk-tinged metal' and a few singles, In the 1990s and 2000s, they concentrated their efforts on live shows and tours, reducing considerably the production of studio albums. During their long career, Girlschool travelled all over the world, playing in many rock and metal festivals and co-headlining with or supporting some of the most important hard rock and heavy metal bands. They maintain a worldwide cult following and are considered an inspiration for many succeeding female rock musicians such as The Donnas. Despite line-up changes in the pas,. original members Kim McAuliffe, Denise (drench) Dufort and Enid Williams are still in the band to this day. Original member lead guitarist /vocalist/songwriter Kelly Johnson died of cancer in 2007 and was replaced by lead guitarist /songwriter Jackie (Jax) Chambers in 1999 till present day.

For the current album „WTFortyfive?“ the fans had to wait eight years and last summer they turned up the volume with the eagerly awaited longplayer full of new hits and hymns by Heavy Metal flagship GIRLSCHOOL. With their song „Party“ they pay tribute to countless Metal and Rock legends. Maybe you can match all lyric quotes? Reasons enough for having the four British women back on the Holy Ground.

She has been included in soundtracks for Dune, Wonder Woman, Inception and various Batman movies. The list could go on and on – there hardly is an output in which the US-artist hasn’t been involved. Long story short: Tina Guo is without a doubt a superstar.

Together with Sabaton and at previous appearances on our festival she was able to experience our beloved and favorite musical genre.

Now the 2017 grammy nominee is ready to hit our stages once again and enter the next chapter of her very own script of life.

SUZI QUATRO, FORTH OF FIVE CHILDREN, BORN UNDER THE SIGN OF GEMINI, JUNE 3RD, 1950, IN DETROIT MICHIGAN.

SHE WAS RAISED IN A MUSICAL FAMILY, INCLUDING 3 SISTERS AND ONE BROTHER, WHO ALL PLAYED VARIOUS INSTRUMENTS. SUZI HERSELF MADE HER DEBUT ON STAGE PLAYING BONGO’S IN HER FATHERS JAZZ BAND, THE ART QUATRO TRIO.

FROM AN EARLY AGE SHE STUDIED CLASSICAL PIANO AND PERCUSSION, THEN AGED 14, BEGAN AN ALL GIRL BAND WITH ELDER SISTER PATTI, CALLED THE PLEASURE SEEKERS. SUZI WAS ‘TOLD’ SHE WOULD BE PLAYING BASS GUITAR, WHICH WAS AS TALL AS HER! SHE A QUICKLY BECAME THE LEAD SINGER AND FRONT PERSON.

THIS BAND TOURED FOR 7 YEARS, VERY  SUCCESSFULLY, RELEASING A FEW SINGLES ALONG THE WAY , THEN CHANGED THEIR  NAME TO CRADLE IN 1969. IT WAS IN THIS BAND, A COUPLE OF YEARS LATER,  THAT MICKIE MOST,  (PRODUCER)  CAME TO A CONCERT, AND OFFERED SUZI A SOLO CONTRACT. SHE FLEW TO ENGLAND IN 1971 TO BEGIN HER JOURNEY  TO FAME. SOON AFTER SUZI BEGAN WORKING WITH  NOW LEGENDARY SONGWRITERS CHINN AND CHAPMAN (MIKE CHAPMAN ALSO PRODUCED) , WHICH RESULTED THE HUGE HIT, CAN THE CAN, WHICH WENT TO NUMBER ONE IN MAY 1973, AND WENT ON TO SELL TWO AND A HALF MILLION COPIES WORLDWIDE.

BETWEEN 1973 AND 1980, SUZI QUATRO FEATURED IN THE BRITISH CHARTS FOR NO LESS THAN 101 WEEKS, AND HAS SOLD TO DATE OVER 55 MILLION RECORDS, AND STILL COUNTING. HER HITS INCLUDE, 48 CRASH, TOO BIG, DEVIL GATE DRIVE, DAYTONA DEMON, THE WILD ONE, SHE’S IN LOVE WITH YOU, MAMA’S BOY, IF YOU CAN’T GIVE ME LOVE, ROCK HARD,  AND A MILLION SELLER IN THE U.S.A., ‘STUMBLIN IN’ A DUET WITH CHRIS NORMAN .

FROM 77-79 SUZI SPREAD HER WINGS AND LANDED A PART ON THE WORLDWIDE HIT T.V. SERIES ‘HAPPY DAYS’, PLAYING LEATHER TUSCADERO OPPOSITE HENRY WINKLER AND RON HOWARD.  SHE CONTINUED TO ACT IN OTHER SHOWS INCLUDING, MINDER, DEMPSEY AND MAKEPEACE, AND MORE UP TO DATE,  ABSOLUTELY FABULOUS AND MIDSOMER MURDERS.

IN 1986 SUZI MADE HER WEST END DEBUT PLAYING THE LEADING ROLD OF ANNIE OAKLEY IN IRVING BERLIN’S ‘ANNIE GET YOUR GUN’ FOR WHICH SHE RECEIVED GREAT CRITICAL ACCLAIM.

1988 SHE SPREAD HER WINGS AGAIN, AND HOSTED HER OWN TALK SHOW CALLED ‘GAS STREET’ WHICH RAN FOR A YEAR.

1989 SUZI WAS ONE OF THE FIRST ROCK AND ROLL ACTS TO GO TO RUSSIA, WHERE SHE PERFORMED FOR OVER HALF A MILLION PEOPLE IN JUST SIX WEEKS.

1991, SHE WAS TRIUMPHANT AGAIN, REALISING A LIFELONG AMBITION BY WRITING THE MUSIC AND LYRICS, ALONG WITH SHIRLIE RODEN, AND STARRING IN ‘TALULLAH BANKHEAD’  IT RAN FOR ITS FULL SEASON OF 5 WEEKS, AND SUZI RECEIVED AMAZING CRITICS, EVEN THOUGH THEY WERE NOT OFFICIALLY ALLOWED INTO REVIEW THE SHOW.

JAN , 1999 STARTED SUZI’S RADIO CAREER WITH BBC RADIO 2, WHICH IS ONGOING TODAY.  SHE HAS DONE HER OWN WEEKY PROGRAMS, AND MANY SPECIAL DOCUMENTARIES INCLUDING ELVIS PRESLEY, OTIS REDDING, JANIS JOPLIN, JIM MORRISON, PATSY CLINE, AND A RECENT SPECIAL ON HER HOME TOWN OF DETROIT.  SHE HAS MET, INTERVIEWED OR PLAYED ON STAGE WITH MOST OF HER HERO’S.   SUZI IS A VERY POPULAR D.J. EVEN BEING NOMINATED FOR MUSIC BROADCASTER OF THE YEAR AT THE SONY RADIO AWARDS IN 2006

1999 ALSO SAW SUZI HONOURED IN ‘THIS IS YOUR LIFE’ , COMPLETE WITH FAMOUS RED BOOK. THEY CAUGHT HER  ON HER 56 DATE UK TOUR, ONSTAGE AT THE PALLADIUM.. COMPLETELY OFF GUARD.  THERE WERE A FEW EXPLETIVES THAT HAD TO BE EDITED OUT!!

IN 2006 SUZI RELEASED THE AUTOBIOGRAPHICAL ALBUM, BACK TO THE DRIVE… WHICH HAS BECOME THE FANS FAVORITE WORLD WIDE.

SUZI ALSO MADE AN APPEARANCE ALONGSIDE CHARLES DANCE IN THE THEATRE, IN A PLAY CALLED ‘EXONERATED AT THIS TIME.

UNZIPPED, SUZI AUTOBIOGRAPY WAS RELEASED IN 2007 AND HAS DONE EXTREMELY WELL WORLDWIDE.. GETTING TO NUMBER 2 IN THE AUSTRALIAN CHARTS WHERE SHE CONTINUES TO TOUR.  THE NEXT TOUR IN 2013 WIL BE HER 29TH DOWN UNDER!!!

ANOTHER ALBUM WITH LONG TIME COLLABORATOR MIKE CHAPMAN, ‘IN THE SPOTLIGHT’ .. WHICH IS NOW ALSO AVALABLE   IN LIMITED EDITION WITH AN EXTRA CD OF UNRELEASED SUZI COMPOSITIONS CALLED ‘IN THE DARK’ , AND AN ENHANCED CD WITH A VIDEO OF ‘STRICT MACHINE’ AND THE NOW LEGENDARY SUZI TRIBUTE TO HER ABSOLUTE HERO, ELVIS PRESELY, ‘SINGING WITH ANGEL’S, WHICH SHE RECORDED IN NASHVILLE WITH JAMES BURTON ON GUITAR, AND ELVIS’S ORIGINAL BACKING VOCAL GROUP, THE JORDINARIES.

IN 2012 SUZI TURNED HER AUTOBIOGRAPHY INTO A ONE WOMAN SHOW WHICH HAD IS FIRST OUTING AT LONDON’S HIPPODROME THEATRE  FOR TWO WEEKS. 

IN 2014, TO CELEBRATE HER 50 YEARS IN THE BUSINESS , BBC RADIO 2 FEATURED THIS SHOW AS PART OF THEIR CHRISTMAS SCHEDULE TAPED AT THE BBC RADIO THEATER. IT WAS PRIME TIME 2 HOURS  LONG, UNZIPPED, TURNING INTO A MINI CONCERT AT THE END , AND WAS ATTENDED BY SUCH LUMINARIES AS BRUCE WELCH (THE SHADOWS) AND ANDREW LLOYD WEBBER.  IT BROKE RECORDS WITH REQUESTS FOR TICKETS AFTER ONLY 1 ANNOUCMENT THAT THIS SHOULD WOULD GO ON. OVER 5000 PEOPLE!

SUZI DID A 23 SELL OUT TOUR OF AUSTRALIA IN 2015, HER 32TH TOUR OF THIS COUNTRY. IT WAS TO BE HER FINAL ‘AUSTRALIA’ TOUR, BUT, THIS DECISION WAS TURNED AROUND ABOURT A YEAR LATER WHEN SHE REALISED SHE WAS NO WHERE ‘NEAR’ RETIREING AND PROMISED HER AUDIENCE , NEVER, TO USE THE F-WORD AGAIN.. (FINAL)

SUZI RELEASED  A POETRY BOOK  CALLED ‘THROUGH MY EYES’. FIRST FOR THE AUSTRALIAN TOUR, AND NOW WORLDWIDE. MANY HAVE CALLED IT HER BEST WORK….  AND HER OWN SELF DESIGNED CHRISTMAS CARDS.

IN 2016, SUZI , TOGETHER  WITH ANDY SCOTT (SWEET) AND DON POWELL (SLADE) , QUATRO SCOTT AND POWELL, RECORDED AN ALBUM, WHICH WAS  RELEASED ON SONY JAN 20TH 2017.  THE ALBUM IS CALLED QSP. THEY WERE   THE OPENING ACT FOR SUZI’S  LEATHER FOREVER ENCORE TOUR FEB/MARCH 2017. THE ALBUM CHARTED AT NUMBER 16 IN AUSTRALIA AND HAS NOW BEEN RELEASED ON SONY WORLDWIDE.

OCTOBER 19TH 2016, SUZI WAS MADE HONORARY DOCTOR OF MUSIC, AND RECEIVED HER AWARD, IN CAP AND GOWN AT CAMBRIDGE UNIVERSITY. SHE IS NOW OFFICALLY DOCTOR QUATRO.

HER FIRST NOVEL, THE HURRICANE WAS RELEASED IN MAY 2017, AND SHE IS ALREADY WORKING ON THE SEQUEL.

 IN MAY 2017, SHE HEADLINED A ‘LEGENDS’  ARENA TOUR IN THE UK, ALONG WITH HOT CHOCOLATE , THE OSMONDS AND DAVID ESSEX.

IN 2018, SHE HEADLINED A SOLD OUT FESTIVAL TOUR OF AUSTRALIA MAKING THIS HER 34TH  TOUR OF THIS COUNTRY TO DATE, AND MORE TO COME NEXT YEAR.

IN 2019 SHE  HEADLINED ANOTHER LEGENDS ARENA TOUR, ALSO DOING 85 SHOWS AROUND THE WORLD, INCLUDING CANADA AND AUSTRALIA. SHE HAS EXTENDED HER NOW ‘SOLO’ SHOWS TO 2 HOURS WITH AN INTERVAL IN ICONIC HALLS.

 HER CURRENT ALBUM WHICH CAME OUT ON MARCH 29, 2019,

 NO CONTROL,AND IS CHARTING ALL AROUND THE WORLD. CRITICS ARE RAVING .  THIS COLLABORATION WAS DONE WITH HER SON RICHARD TUCKEY WHO CO WROTE MOST OF THE TRACKS AND PLAYED GUITAR.  IT IS ONE OF HER FINEST ALBUM., SELF PRODUCED, ORGANIC, AND SHE HAS COME HOME!

IN 2019 HER DOCUMENTARY,  SUZI Q WAS RELEASED, FIRST IN AUSTRALIA, PLAYING IN 92 CINEMA’S ,THEN THE UK PLAYING IN 52 CINEMA’S AND ALL  ACROSS EUROPE., AND IN JULY IN  2020, IN THE USA., WHICH WAS DELAYED DUE TO THE PANDEMIC. THIS FILM HAS BEEN A HUGE CRITICAL SUCCESS DRAWING 4 AND 5 STARS IN ALL MEDIA REVIEWS, AND HAS HAD SATURATION COVERSAGE AND ACCEPTANCE WORLDWIDE. AT THE TIME OF THIS UPDATE IT IS IN THE AMAZON CHARTS AT NUMBER 2. THE USA WAS THE LAST TO PREMIERE IT BECAUSE OF THE PANDEMIC,BUT IT IS NOW OUT THERE GETTING AGAIN, SATURACTION COVERAGE AND RAVE REVIEWS. IT HAS BEEN FEATURED ON CNN, ENTERTAINMENT TONIGHT, GOLDEN GLOBES PAGE, BILLBOARD, ROLLING STONE AND VARIETY JUST TO NAME A FEW.. IT IS A  WARTS AND ALL, RAW AND REAL FILM, AND BECAUSE OF THE ATTENTION IT  HAS RECEIVED, SHE HAS NOW SIGNED TO DO A MOVIE OF HER LIFE. THE SCRIPT IS NEARING COMPLETION AND A LIST OF NAMES HAS BEEN DRAWN UP TO PLAY SUZI.

 IN 2021 SHE RELEASED A SECOND ALBUM,  WITH HER SON, ‘THE DEVIL IN ME’, WHICH ALSO CHARTED AROUND THE WORLD.

IN 2022 SHE RELEASED ‘UNCOVERED’ ON THE SUN RECORD LABEL. 6 OF HER FAVORITE COVER SONGS, WHICH WILL BE IN A SOON TO BE ANNOUNCE STREAM. A CHANCE TO SEE HER PLAY THESE TRACK LIVE, ONE TIME ONLY.

TO DATE SHE HAS PUBLISHED 6 BOOKS, AND IS WORKING ON HER SECOND NOVEL.

2023 MARKS THE 50TH ANNIVERSAY OF CAN THE CAN BEING NUMBER ONE AND SHE WILL MARK THE OCCASION WITH 5 SPECIAL SHOWS IN THE UK.

2024 SEE HER EMBARKING ON HER 38TH TOUR OF AUSTRALIA, MAKING HER THE RECORD HOLDER FOR INTERNATIONAL ARTISTS VISITING PLAYING DOWN UNDER.

SUZI IS NEVER IDLE, SHE MUST ENTERTAIN, SHE MUST CREATE, AND SHE MUST COMMUNICATE.. IT IS THE AIR SHE BREATHES… A TRUE ARTISTE.

 HER FAMOUS QUOTE SAYS IT ALL.

“I WILL RETIRE WHEN I GO ON STAGE , SHAKE MY ASS, AND THERE IS SILENCE’

Formed in 2016 in Presov, Slovakia, Etterna is a Melodic Metalcore band known for blending aggressive modern metal with emotional, melodic elements. Their music features catchy melodies intertwined with heavy breakdowns, stirring up energy in the moshpit. The band's lyrics, which often explore personal themes, resonate deeply with their fans, adding a layer of intimacy and relatability to their powerful sound.
assets.subtitle: Metal Battle Slovakia

assets.biography: Graufar, named after an old German word for the color "grey," was formed in Linz, Austria, at the end of 2020. Since 2022, they have graced the stages of various concerts and festivals, captivating audiences with their unique blend of Black Metal, Death Metal, and melodic elements. This fusion brings dynamic vocal styles, transitioning from classic Black Metal screams to deep growls. On April 13th, 2024, Graufar released their debut album "Scordalus," which explores a range of themes. The lyrics, in both English and German, delve into socially critical topics, the darker aspects of humanity, and personal experiences.
assets.subtitle: Metal Battle Austria

assets.biography:
Black Tooth is a Groove Metal band, founded 2006 in Turkey by Tuna ( Vocal ), Deniz ( Bass ) and Utku ( Drums ).
The adventure of BLACK TOOTH started with the Myspace page we opened in 2006. Right after we uploaded our first 2 songs to our Myspace page, they were highly appreciated by the listeners, especially in U.S.A and Europe. Soon after, our songs were requested from popular Rock/Metal internet radio stations (12 stations from Europe, about 20 stations from America) and started to be played on these stations. After these developments, Dimebag Darrell's girlfriend Rita Haney ( https://www.instagram.com/dimebagzhag ) contacted us in 2007 and stated that she loved our songs and wanted us to play in U.S.
In August 2007 we traveled from our country to the USA. And with the support of Rita Haney, we gave a total of 7 concerts, including the Ride For Dime Festival.

After this tour, we returned to our country and continued to play actively in concerts and festivals. Our popularity on Myspace continued to increase day by day, and as a result, we received sponsorship offers from 3 big companies. (Turk Tuborg Carlsberg, Etnies Turkey, Harley Davidson Club Turkey).
In the winter of 2007 we got a special invite from Vinnie Paul R.I.P (PanterA, Hellyeah, Damageplan). He had watched us at the Ride For Dime Festival and liked it very much. Thus, in November 2007, we opened show of Hellyeah, Otep and Bloodsimple a Palladium / Dallas as part of the Hellyeah's Balls Volume Strenght Tour.

In 2008 we were invited back to the Ride For Dime Festival in Texas. Meanwhile, Rita Haney contacted us again, asking us to join and compete in Battle Of The Bands to participate in 2008 OZZFEST (August 9 at Dallas' Pizza Hut Park.
Texas radio station 97.1 The Eagle teamed up with The Loft and Monster Energy to send a lucky group to kick off 2008's Ozzfest. He identified 10 bands out of over 300 U.S band applications.

Black Tooth won "Battle Of The Bands" at Dallas The Loft on August 7, 2008 and performed at Monster Energy Drink Stage (Texas Stage) at Ozzfest ( August 9, 2008 ). We performed 9 more concerts in the U.S.A that summer, including Ride For Dime and Ozzfest.

We continued to play with local and foreign famous bands in many open air festivals and concerts in our country and close geography and In 2009, we played at Sweeden Rock Festival. This further increased our popularity in Europe at that time.

The band, which was given 4 stars out of 5 in the daily performance score chart prepared for the Festival by Swedish Local Newspapers, was included among the gold medalist bands of the Festival by Sweden Rock Festival Magazine.

In 2010, we played with the giants of metal history at SONISPHERE FESTIVAL, one of the biggest traveling festivals in Europe, and thus, we gave our first stadium concert.

In addition to playing in many other outdoor festivals in our country that year, we made a magnificent opening for Lamb of God ( 17 May 2010 )

We performed with many famous metal/rock bands at nearly one hundred concerts & festivals and we continue to play actively.

Some foreign bands and artists we played with together.
Opeth, Ensiferum, Amon Amarth, Korpiklaani, Napalm Death, Sepultura, Bloodbath, Korn, Behemoth, Gojira, Soulfly, Unleashed, Annihilator, Testament, Overkill, Lordi, Epica, Dark Tranquility, Apocaliyptica, Annihilator, Doro Dyna Dev Scented, One Bullet Left, Sodom, Caliban.

In 2022, we continue to play in concerts and international festivals as Black Tooth. We took the stage at Exit Festival de Explosive Stage in July 2022.


Tuna Vural – Vocal
Orcan Kolankaya – Guitar
Daghan Erdogan – Guitar
Deniz Karadogan – Bass
Utku Cagatay Arslan – Drums
assets.subtitle: Metal Battle Caucasia & Turkyie

assets.biography: Black Tooth, a powerhouse Groove Metal trio hailing from Turkey and formed in 2004 by Tuna on vocals, Deniz on bass, and Utku on drums, embarked on their musical odyssey through the digital landscape of Myspace in 2006. Their inaugural tracks resonated deeply with listeners, propelling them into the spotlight across the U.S.A and Europe and earning airtime on numerous Rock/Metal internet radio stations. With momentum building, the band received a fateful call from Rita Haney, girlfriend of the late Dimebag Darrell, which led to a transformative journey to the U.S.A in August 2007. Bolstered by Haney's support, they rocked stages across the country, including a memorable performance at the Ride For Dime Festival. Upon returning home, Black Tooth continued to captivate audiences and attract sponsorship from major companies, while catching the attention of Vinnie Paul, resulting in an electrifying opening slot for Hellyeah in Dallas. The band's ascent continued with a victorious Battle of the Bands triumph, securing them a coveted spot at Ozzfest 2008 and a string of electrifying performances across the U.S.A. Their momentum carried them to prestigious festivals like Sweden Rock in 2009, solidifying their status as a force to be reckoned with in the global metal scene, sharing stages with icons like Opeth, Korn, and Sepultura.
assets.subtitle: Metal Battle Caucasia & Türkiye

assets.biography: From  the coastal city of Jeddah, Saudi Arabia, Wasted Land stands as a remarkable metal band that has captivated audiences since its inception in 2004. Breaking barriers and extending their reach beyond Saudi borders, the band's passion for music has propelled them to global recognition. With a deep appreciation for live performance at their core, Wasted Land has achieved significant milestones, including being one of the first melodic death metal bands from Saudi Arabia to open for Lacuna Coil at the Dubai Metal Fest. This achievement not only showcased their talent but also marked a milestone in the acceptance of their genre within the region.
assets.subtitle: Metal Battle Saudi Arabia

assets.biography: In 2011, when they played as Phantom X, they did not know that they will win the Metal Battle as PHANTOM EXCALIVER with their great mixture of Power Metal, Death Metal and Metalcore on 3rd August, 2023. A memorable date, that the four musicians from Japan will never forget. Having recorded two albums and preparing lots of surprises for you, they spare no effort to travel from their hometown Tokyo to Wacken for the 20th anniversary of the legendary Metal Battle.

Hailing from the vibrant city of Johannesburg, South Africa, Sunken State emerges as a beacon of innovation in the progressive metal landscape. Since their inception in 2019, they've swiftly garnered attention for their mesmerizing sound, seamlessly blending intricate melodies, technical prowess, and poignant lyrics that defy conventional boundaries. With each dynamic composition, Sunken State pushes the envelope of the genre, crafting sonic landscapes that captivate and inspire. Led by vocalist Dwayne Hees, guitarist Mathew Swanepoel, drummer Pete Pistorius, and bassist Sean Gaisford, Sunken State exudes a tight-knit camaraderie and electrifying presence on stage, solidifying their reputation as a force to be reckoned with in the world of progressive metal and beyond.
assets.subtitle: Metal Battle Sub Saharan Africa

assets.biography: INFO, a stalwart in the Colombian industrial metal scene, has unfurled the banners of the movement across national rock and metal circuits, cementing their status as a cornerstone of the genre. Committed to showcasing Colombia's musical prowess and pioneering new trends, INFO draws inspiration from icons like Ministry, Rammstein, and Rob Zombie while forging their own distinct sound. With a rich performance history including renowned festivals like Manizales Grita Rock Fest, Rock al Parque, and Calibre, alongside accolades such as Shock Magazine Awards nominations and Subterranica Awards victories, they've solidified their position as trailblazers. From sharing stages with international acts like PAIN and COMBICHRIST to opening for legends like SUICIDAL TENDENCIES and ENTOMBED, INFO's journey reflects a relentless pursuit of musical innovation and global recognition.
assets.subtitle:
Metal Battle South America 
Northern Region

assets.biography: Junkwolvz, a heavy metal/hard rock band from Athens, Greece, officially formed in 2019, building on roots established in 2017. They debuted with the demo "Still Going Down" in the summer of 2020 and have since released three singles: "A Blackened Star," "The Monster," and "Ride With Me." Known for their electrifying performances across Greece and Europe, the band features Panos (guitars & vocals), Chris (guitars), Samer (bass), and Haris (drums). With their first LP on the horizon, Junkwolvz is set to make a significant impact on the metal scene.
assets.subtitle: Metal Battle Greece

assets.biography: Formed in 2016 in the rugged terrain around Bergen, Norway, Tessia is a metal band known for their powerful and deep sound. The current lineup features Julie Berthelsen (vocals), Dennis Pedersen (guitar, vocals), Eirik Atlesson Paulsen (guitar), Matias Boge (bass), and Sindre Haugen (drums). Their music, drawing comparisons to bands like Lacuna Coil, Amaranthe, and Arch Enemy, showcases a blend of intensity and depth. Tessia's talent and unity culminated in a major achievement in 2024, winning the Wacken Metal Battle Norway, solidifying their presence in the metal scene.
assets.subtitle: Metal Battle Norway

assets.biography: Formed amidst the fiery depths of El Salvador's metal scene in August 2015, Fleshless Entity emerged as a formidable force in Blackened Death Metal, founded by Juan Chacón and Erlin de la O with a vision for profound impact across Latin America and beyond. With Alonso Ramos soon joining the ranks, the band swiftly carved their mark, igniting stages across Central America. From their explosive debut opening for THERION to international showcases alongside revered acts like Possessed, Fleshless Entity commanded attention with their visceral performances. With the release of their debut EP "Nihility Servants" and subsequent triumphs at El Salvador Metal Fest, the band's ascent continued unabated, culminating in the monumental release of their full-length opus "UNBORN RISING" in 2023. With a relentless touring schedule spanning Central and South America, and triumphant victories in prestigious competitions like Wacken Metal Battle, Fleshless Entity stands as a beacon of infernal might, poised to conquer stages worldwide.
assets.subtitle: Metal Battle Central America

assets.biography: We not only celebrate 20 loud years of Metal Battle this year, but also raise our horns to 20 years of DRONE. After several years of hiatus the German Thrash Metal powerhouse comes back to the big stages and works eagerly on new songs. We are more than curious what the quartet from Celle will release in the upcoming months. Be sure: It will be groovy and thrilling as hell!

Over 150 million streams and over 155k followers on Spotify

"Dark Side" single charted in over 20 countries and peaked at #47 on Active Rock Radio in the US, being #5 on Octane Big Uns countdown

Over 500 000 followers on social media platforms

Over 100 international shows in 2022, including European tour with Electric Callboy, US tour with From Ashes To New and their own European Headline Tour

Wacken Open Air festival main stage slot for 2022

Within one decade BLIND CHANNEL have achieved all what other metalheads only dream of: in 2014 they won the Metal Battle Finland, represented Finland at the European Song Contest 2021, were honored with Gold and Platinum awards in their home country and played already two times at the W:O:A. But all good things come in threes: The self-proclaimed „Backstreet Boys of the Metal scene“ are back on the Holy Ground with their new album „Exit Emotions“.

From the picturesque region of Zeeuws Vlaanderen, the local band INHERITED emerges as a powerful voice amidst the tranquil landscape. Born from the echoes of polluted inheritance, this dynamic quintet consists of five exceptionally talented and youthful members who breathe life into their music with raw passion and energy. With each electrifying performance, INHERITED unleashes a sonic force that transcends boundaries, captivating audiences and leaving an indelible mark on the local music scene. As they navigate the complexities of their musical journey, INHERITED stands poised to carve their own legacy, forging a path of creativity and expression that is uniquely their own.
assets.subtitle: Metal Battle Netherlands

assets.biography: Formed in 2019 in Viana do Castelo, Portugal, Vøidwomb is a black/death metal band known for its unique extreme sound. The band, consisting of M.S. Void, Noctvs, F.S. Void, Lord, and Fractal, released their debut EP, "Altars of Cosmic Devotion," in 2021. Despite pandemic delays, they performed over thirty concerts in Portugal and Galicia, earning recognition in the underground scene. In 2024, they released "Spiritual Apotheosis" through Avantgarde Music, receiving excellent reviews and performing at Wacken Open Air.
assets.subtitle: Metal Battle Portugal

assets.biography: TÜRBÖWITCH, formed in 2016 by vocalist Zslöd and guitarist Kommandante Klit, started as a fun side project inspired by the extreme music and aesthetics of the 80s. Over time, the project became more serious, expanding to a 5-piece band. They released a demo in 2016, an LP ("Napalm to Posers") in 2017, an EP ("Beyond the Last Call") in 2018, and a second full-length album ("Fullmoon Liquorthropy") in late 2022. They've shared stages with renowned international acts like Abigail (JPN), Mystifier (BR), and Nunslaughter (USA). Despite two lineup changes (both on drums), the band maintains great relationships with all members. They're dedicated to fast, loud music, and a high-energy, fun-loving lifestyle.
assets.subtitle: Metal Battle Hungary

assets.biography: In the heart of Kyiv, a city pulsating with energy and history, KARABINER emerges as a formidable force in the realm of Thrash Metal. Established in 2020, their music embodies the essence of high intensity, old-school aggression, and blistering speed, while seamlessly intertwining elements from genres like death metal and speed metal. From the outset, KARABINER has embraced the stage, cultivating a vibrant concert presence and sharing platforms with esteemed acts such as XONOR. Their discography, comprising two EPs and two singles, reflects their unwavering commitment to their craft and their latest release, "Reanimate," stands as a testament to their collaborative spirit, a dynamic fusion with XONOR from Switzerland. As they continue to carve their mark in the metal landscape, KARABINER's relentless energy and dedication promise an exhilarating journey for fans worldwide.
assets.subtitle: Metal Battle Ukraine

assets.biography: SHVRIKEN was founded in 2016 by vocalist Shawn Talacero and guitarist Dave Orat, initially playing Metalcore and Nu-metal covers. After several lineup changes, the band solidified with bassist RR Porminal and drummer Jose Perpetua. In 2023, guitarist Earl Borres joined, and SHVRIKEN has since been touring Cebu and Manila. Known for extended range guitars, groovy riffs, and energetic performances, they bring fire to the stage with their Sengoku Era-inspired outfits. Influenced by Monuments, Meshuggah, and Periphery, SHVRIKEN's sound mixes modern Metal with a hint of Progressive elements.
assets.subtitle: Metal Battle Philippines

assets.biography: Born from the depths of ethereal inspiration, ÆoniK transcends mortal boundaries, weaving dark melodies that resonate with echoes from distant spheres. With Änder, Jeff, Raphael, and Marc as the cornerstone and Roland as the final piece, the ensemble channels a shared vision into a realm where mystical forces intertwine with human creativity. Guided by Änder's premonitions and recent compositions like "The Roamer of Heaven and Hell," their journey unfolds as a conduit for the enigmatic energies coursing through the universe. As 2023 drew to a close, their debut EP emerged, a profound testament to their connection with the mysterious. Infused with haunting melodies and atmospheric black metal, ÆoniK's music channels the essence of the Roamer, transcending mortal confines and echoing throughout the boundless expanse of existence.
assets.subtitle: Metal Battle Luxembourg

assets.biography: Doomsday Astronaut is an instrumental progressive metal band hailing from Sibiu, Romania, founded in 2022 by guitarist Waqas Ahmed. The band quickly made a mark, winning the grand prize at the Posada Rock Festival the same year. In 2023, Waqas Ahmed was honored as Best Metal Guitarist at the "Constelatii Rock" contest. Doomsday Astronaut has graced prominent festivals like Metalhead Meeting and Posada Rock Festival, sharing stages with legendary acts such as Pantera, Soen, and Leprous.
assets.subtitle: Metal Battle Romania & Republic Moldova

assets.biography: Carbonic Fields, formed in 2018 by guitarist/composer Mathieu Méheust and vocalist Thomas D'Herbomez, channels the daily aggressions we face into eclectic and corrosive Metal. Their debut album "ITE EST" was released in 2021, featuring the music video "Devilium." Evolving into a full band for live performances, they have played several concerts and festivals in 2022 and 2023. Their ambitious 2023 music video "POLKA THRASH" received critical acclaim. Currently, Carbonic Fields is working on their second album, continuing to share their unique auditory and visual universe.
assets.subtitle: Metal Battle France

assets.biography: Thus is a battle-ready metal band from Aarhus, Denmark, redefining the metal scene with their progressive riffs, complex rhythms, and melancholic melodies. Comprised of seasoned musicians from bands like Chronicle, Mother of All, and Livløs, Thus offers a modern take on Scandinavian death metal. Their debut EP, 'The Terminal Condition of Existence,' produced by Andreas Linnemann and featuring drummer Sebastian Lanser, showcases five explosive tracks. Having won the Danish Wacken Metal Battle, Thus is set to captivate international audiences with their dynamic live performances.
assets.subtitle: Metal Battle Denmark

assets.biography:
Walkways is an alternative metal band based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

Starting off in 2006, the band was formed by Ran Yerushalmi (vocals) and Bar Caspi (guitars) who started playing together. Soon after, Yoni Menner (guitars) joined and a more concrete musical style was formed. Priel Horesh (drums) and Avihai Levy (bass) joined in 2010, finalizing the lineup.All members of the band started listening and playing music at a fairly young age, and later on some studied at professional music academies. Each of the band members started making music for different reasons, but the passion for creating music was common among everyone.

The band is driven with a goal to keep sane and evolve into more humane and moral people while writing their music - the soundtrack of the highs and falls of their lives.
"We create in order to unload. To deal with feelings - mainly aggressions. No one has the right or legitimacy to let their ego run wild, as sadly, too many people do these days. We believe that the choice is both ours and yours. We choose not to act as the "default version" of ourselves. We choose to stay in control and rise above it. No excuses, no matter what we've been through. Our past is not our future".

Walkways' sophomore album "Bleed Out, Heal Out" was released in 2019 on Nuclear Blast Records, receiving striking reviews in various international magazines and music blogs. "Bleed Out, Heal Out" displays a unique mix of Alternative Metal and Metalcore, a style that combines heavy riffs and soft parts, emotional melodies and a wide range of vocal styles. The album was self produced by the band, mixed by the band’s very own Priel Horesh, and mastered by Ermin Hamidovich at Systematic Productions.

Following an exciting few years of touring, including direct support for Avenged Sevenfold, Disturbed, In Flames, Devin Townsend, Jinjer, and many more - the band is now working on their third full length album.

Since 2006 WALKWAYS have paved their way to the top of the Israeli Metal scene…and far beyond. With their self-released debut album „Save In Sound“ they laid the foundation of their discography, were praised for their second album worldwide by press and fans in 2019 and now it is time, to go the „Walkway“ further. We are looking forward to see them again at the W:O:A, where they made our hearts sing during the Metal Battle 2015.

Spanish Thrash metal champions Crisix released their last album Against the odds this April via Listenable records and toured all year starting with sold out Full metal cruise, series of headlining shows across Europe, summer festivals as Hellfest, Alcatraz, Download, CMOA, Rude, Mise Open Air, Kutten Fest, Metal Scar, Full metal Holiday,... and played shows as direct support to Body Count. In autumn they performed at many specialized festivals in France, Switzerland and Germany and embark on the first Latin America tour, starting with packed show in Mexico city. After Latin America they will play two very special shows in Barcelona and Madrid and will continue with Spanish tour over the winter, before going back to Germany, France, Belgium and Netherlands for solo shows, festivals and a tour in spring 2019.

Their live performance is even more crazy than you know it. The energy is tripling and it shows that Crisix is a non stop recording and touring artist that played hundreds of shows after winning the Wacken prize back in 2009. They keep on thrashing, exchange the instruments, play in the pit and party with the audience, always full of surprises. They will celebrate 10 years of live thrashing madness with special show at W:O:A 2019 bringing a special set of classics.

BB Plaza: ‘’We are very emotional about returning to Wacken stage. We will never forget our first performance there, we were just kids and it was a life-changing experience performing in front of such masses and then winning it all. And now returning as an active band, its a very sweet moment. We will prepare something ultra special for Crisix show at Wacken 2019.’’

15 years ago CRISIX won our legendary Metal Battle. Since then they played numerous big festivals and toured with their five albums all over the globe. Passionate and full of energy the Spanish Thrash-Metal quintet truly belongs to the loud and heavy cosmos. Watch out for their show at the W:O:A: Live, brutal and high-resolution like in „Full HD“.
The legendary band of the fire brigade wacken!
The legendary band of the fire brigade wacken!
The legendary band of the fire brigade wacken!

The legendary band of the fire brigade wacken!

Metaklapa is a Croatian a cappella band that interprets songs by Iron Maiden without any instruments at all, but with brilliant polyphonic vocals. Actually, "Klapa" describes a musical group that sings passionate and upbeat, polyphonic Croatian a cappella folk songs. This centuries-old singing style is an UNESCO World Heritage Site and comes mainly from Dalmatia and southern Croatia. All six members sing in several Klapas and have been cultivating this style for years. And all six are sworn metalheads and worship Iron Maiden. Each has their own personal history with this band and their songs. Now, for the first time, they combine their singing tradition with their passion for heavy metal and hard rock and they believe: Heavy Metal and Klapa, that fits! The music of Iron Maiden is strongly based on vocal melodies, and these are the main part of Klapa singing, it is less about rhythm. Metaklapa manages to keep both the traditional characteristics of Klapa singing and the metal character of the songs.

Their debut album "The Choir of Beasts" is produced by none other than Marko M. Sekul, who has already enjoyed considerable success in Croatia and on the international stage with his folk-metal band Manntra.

The sound of Metaklapa is reminiscent of the powerful choral songs of Gregorian and the sensitive performances of Dark Tenor. In the spring of 2021 Metaklapa signed their record deal with the German label NoCut Entertainment, with the help of which they now want to conquer the auditory canals of metalheads and classic rock fans.

Actually, "Klapa" describes a musical group that sings passionate and upbeat, polyphonic Croatian a cappella folk songs. This centuries-old singing style is an UNESCO World Heritage Site and comes mainly from Dalmatia and southern Croatia. Metaklapa manages to keep both the traditional characteristics of Klapa singing and the metal character of the songs.

Their debut album "The Choir of Beasts" is produced by none other than Marko M. Sekul, who has already enjoyed considerable success in Croatia and on the international stage with his folk-metal band Manntra.

In the spring of 2021 Metaklapa signed their record deal with the German label NoCut Entertainment, with the help of which they now want to conquer the auditory canals of metalheads and classic rock fans.

They combine the traditional Croatian vocal style „Klapa“ with the songs of their favourite band Iron Maiden. METAKLAPA are six singers from the sunny Croatia, which give the old classics a new and remarkable a-cappella note – with tenor, baritone and bass. Thanks to their acclaimed debut album „The Choir Of Beasts“ they got international attention and have already convinced the W:O:A-crowd.

„Nie Wieder Met“ or „1000 Jahre Bier“? While this could be a question for hard-drinking metalheads. These are actually two song titles off the current album „Titanium“ by VOGELFREY, who will visit  Wacken again this year. Look forward to a superb Folk Metal show with party guarantee and songs of meanwhile two decades by Hamburg’s Rock formation.

If you combine Raggae, Ska and Punk Rock, the result will be JAYA THE CAT. Founded in 1995 in Boston, the band has already been nominated for the Boston Music Awards and is known for a versatile live show. After they moved to Amsterdam in 2003, they also enjoy greater popularity in Europe. Let’s welcome their Drunk Rock Raggae at the W:O:A!

They mocked the police, set fire to the school and sang gloomily about the death of the president. They let the plane take off at parties, conjured up the delights of kleptomania and the abysses of cocaine – at least this is what they sang about in their snotty Punk gems at the end of the 70s. Five boys from Hagen, Germany had just discovered the beauty of the 3-minute guitar anthem with subversive lyrics and soon even conquered the charts with it: Extrabreit, the inventors of German Pop-Punk. Until now their hymns are steady pillars at every happening 80s party – and they will also be a guarantee for total fun & madness in this unusual setting!

Seit der Gründung im Jahre 2006 performt der deutsche Sechser aus dem Rhein‐Main‐Gebiet melodische Metalsongs für 5 Sänger und einen Drummer. Alle Instrumente, die in normalen Metalbands gespielt werden, werden von Van Canto gesungen: Bass, Gitarren, Solos, Keyboardflächen. Dazu kommen mit Sly und Inga zwei echte Leadsänger, die auch in jeder anderen Metalband eine gute Figur machen würden.

Das erste selbstproduzierte Album A Storm to Come wird im Dezember 2006 über das bandeigene eigenes Label veröffentlicht,  dazu gibt es das erste selbstproduzierte Video zu ‘The Mission’. Danach folgen in rasanter Reihenfolge Festivalgigs, euphorische Reaktionen, ein Plattendeal bei Gun Records / Sony BMG, Gigs mit Nightwish, Rage und Konsorten. Der  Sommer 2008 bringt eine Brasilientour und das Wacken Open Air. Die Mischung aus Eigenkompositionen und gecoverten Metal‐Klassikern (von denen es Metallica’s ‘Battery’ auch auf das erste Album schafft) macht scheinbar nicht nur der Band Spaß, sondern bringt Van Canto eine treue Fanbasis ein.

Im September 2008 kommt das zweite Album Hero. Mit Charlie Bauerfeind in den Blind Guardian Studios produziert, kommen hier neben den eigenen Songs auch 5 Cover auf die Platte. Hits von Nightwish (‚Wishmaster‘), Manowar (‚Kings of Metal‘), Iron Maiden (‚Fear of  the Dark‘) und Deep Purple (‘Stormbringer’) werden im A Capella Metal Gewand neu vertont. Höhepunkt ist der ‘Bard’s Song’ von Blind Guardian, der sogar Hansi Kürsch davon überzeugt, bei Van Canto‘s eigenem Song ‘Take to the Sky’ mitzusingen.

Danach folgt eine eigene Deutschlandtour und anschließend eine weitere als Support der Letzten Instanz. Mit den dann folgenden Festivals, u.a. gemeinsam mit Manowar auf der Loreley endet die Hero‐Tour. Van Canto sind jetzt zweieinhalb Jahre alt, und haben 2 Veröffentlichungen und 60 Gigs hinter sich. Der bandeigene Schlachtruf Rakkatakka

Motherfucker ist inzwischen mehr als nur dem ein oder anderen Metaller ein Begriff. 

Im August 2009 kehrt die Band ins Studio zurück und arbeitet erneut mit Charlie Bauerfeind an der dritten Platte Tribe of Force. Die zahlreichen Auftritte in den letzten 2 Jahren haben die Band reifen, lassen und darin bestärkt wieder vermehrt auf Eigenkompositionen zu setzen. 

Da gecoverte Metal‐Klassiker aber weiterhin wichtiger Teil der Liveauftritte von Van Canto sind, enthält auch Tribe of Force zwei Coversongs im A Capella Gewand: Die Grave Digger Hymne ‚Rebellion‘ wird von Labelkollege und Metalikone Chris Boltendahl veredelt, zudem wagt sich Van Canto mit ‚Master of Puppets‘ erneut an einen Metallica‐Klassiker.

In den letzten 2 Jahren konnte Van Canto zahlreiche Freunde in der Metalszene sammeln, und so wundert es nicht, dass auch Prominente wie Tony Kakko (Sonata Arctica) und der Rage‐Gitarrenheld Victor Smolski (der sich ein feuriges Duell mit einer gesungenen  Leadgitarre liefert) mit Gastauftritten auf Tribe of Force glänzen.

Tribe of Force erscheint im Februar 2010, gefolgt von einer Clubtour und Auftritten auf den angesagten Metal‐Festivals.

Oil your vocal cords! VAN CANTO grab the microphones in 2024 and celebrate an extraordinary Metal-A-Capella-show with you. Meanwhile they are eight singers in the band. Be it self-written songs or iconic cover-songs: The instruments are played with strong voice power and a drummer supports the special combo. This will be rakkatakka.

They conquered the Metal world with their catchy Epic Metal and they are ready to defend their grounds: Bavaria’s crowd-pleasers EQUILIBRIUM are stronger than ever with their new singer Fabian Getto. „Shelter“ gives you a first taste of for their new songs, which of course they will be presenting also on the Holy Ground.

You want some Modern Thrash Metal extraordinaire? Then Infected Union  give you all your ears long for! After several videos, single releases and their album „Embrace The Beast“ from 2017 the metalheads from Rostock, Germany, are ready to knock down the W:O:A stages with you.

This screams for a megamosh! S.D.I from Germany are keeping up the true Thrash Metal Spirit from the 80s! Founded in a sleepy small town in Germany in 1985/1986, these dudes will burn down our Holy Ground in 2024!

Attention! With Deimos Dawn we got the German Thrash-Metal-Newcomer sensation for you. Since 2017 the four friends play together and with Marc Grewe (ex-Morgoth, Incidious Disease) they got the pure voice power on the micro. Let’s get wasted… the „Anthem of the Lost“ is awaiting you.

Hola! HITTEN are one of Spain’s hottest topics when it comes to Metal blacksmiths. With their perfect mixture of 80s Hard Rock sound and a modern Metal approach they will fire you up. Hell yeah, this will be a blast!

They still exist: the DIY until I die band projects, the musicians who record sounds in their bedrooms as teenagers - and the underground acts that suddenly everyone is talking about! Hellripper from Aberdeen, Scotland is one of them. Before conquering stages around the world, there was a time when he was sitting in his room and recorded and mixed all the instruments and vocals for his debut EP, "The Manifestation." He now brings reinforcements for his live shows, but otherwise, Hellripper remains a one-man army: fast, hard, and clearly blackened Thrash 'n' Roll with groove in it‘s blood. We are excited to welcome him to the Holy Ground for the first time with a loud "All Hail the Goat!".

When it comes to modern heavy metal there are few bands operating at the same level as Portrait! Hailing all the way from Sweden these guys have been forging their own path since one and a half decades already, and in the process infusing life into a longstanding, well-established genre and taking it in new directions - always striving to put their own style into this band! Reason enough to give it your all on the Holy Ground!

Ready to celebrate their 20th anniversary and with their sixth longplayer released, EVILE come back to the Holy Ground. As Wasted Wednesday headliners the four Englishmen will beat you round the head with finest Thrash Metal, until the last neck cries for recovery. Welcome back Evile!

In Metal Yoga we will take spirituality and the worship of metal to a different level. Be prepared to unleash your inner beast, to summon the darkness as you are freeing your spirit, to completely tap into the dark side, to scream, beat, sweat, and do anything you need to do to free yourself. Listen to your favorite metal tunes while letting your body burn with hellish heat. Learn how to move, scream and breath all at the same time. Raise your metal horns(mantras), and offer your practice to the darkness. We will be holding poses until we feel their deep fire creep into our bodies until we are ready to rest like the dead. All levels are welcome and especially the ones who never dared to try yoga. Be ready to party on these early Metal Mornings!

Vanilla ice-cream and olive oil, dogs in the office, yoga and Wacken? Some things seem to be from another planet only at the first glance. With her Metal Yoga Saskia Thode is bringing the best of both worlds. Just as Hannah Montana did – just the Metal way. You won’t find any better warm-up session to oil your rusty neck. Metal and Yoga? – Formidable.

Erneut findet an allen Tagen des W:O:A. der große Festival Slam statt mit großen Namen der deutschsprachigen Slamszene von Nah und Fern! In den ersten drei Tagen kämpfen hochkarätige Slammerinnen und Slammer um die Gunst des Publikums und um den Einzug in das große Finale am Samstag mit den Tagessiegern und Tagessiegerinnen. Vom laut bis leise, ernst bis komisch und gereimt bis erzählt macht beim Poetry Slam gerade die Mischung die Faszination aus.

Mit dabei sind bekannte Größen der Szene wie Lasse Samströn aus Bonn, Annika Blanke aus Oldenburg und die bekannteste Slammerin des Nordens: Mona Harry, berühmt geworden durch ihre Liebeserklärung an den Norden.

Erneut findet an allen Tagen des W:O:A. der große Festival Slam statt mit großen Namen der deutschsprachigen Slamszene von Nah und Fern! In den ersten drei Tagen kämpfen hochkarätige Slammerinnen und Slammer um die Gunst des Publikums und um den Einzug in das große Finale am Samstag mit den Tagessiegern und Tagessiegerinnen. Vom laut bis leise, ernst bis komisch und gereimt bis erzählt macht beim Poetry Slam gerade die Mischung die Faszination aus.

Wacken Slam Battle 2023

Auch in diesem Jahr kämpfen 12 bekannte und hochdekorierte Slammerinnen und Slammer des deutschsprachigen Poetry Slams um die Wacken Slam Krone. Einige sind Siegerinnen und Sieger von Landesmeisterschaften verschiedener Bundesländer. Von Mittwoch bis Freitag finden Vorrunden statt, die Tagessiegerinnen und Sieger treten am Samstag im Finale an im Slam Battle um den Jahressieg. Mit Texten von ernst bis komisch, gereimt bis erzählt, leise bis laut spiegeln sie die Vielfalt dieses Wettkampfs der Worte. Das Publikum entscheidet!

Mit:

Henrik Szanto

Micha-El Goehre

Mona Harry

Jann Wattjes

Annika Blanke

Lennart Hamann

Sven Kamin

Sarah Garstenstein

Selina Seemann

Hannes Maaß

Matti Seidel

Thomas Nast

You take poetry-slam artists, a stage and get a poetry-slam battle. You take poetry-slam artists, Metal, a stage at Wacken and a horde of Metalheads – voila you’ll get the Wacken Slam Battle. Stagediving can’t be ruled out.

Dr. Nico Rose ist der Sinnput-Geber. In einem früheren Leben war er u.a. Professor für Wirtschaftspsychologie an einer renommierten Business School und Vice President in einem internationalen Medienkonzern. Auf Facebook betreibt er seit 2018 das „Ministerium für Schwermetall“, eine Seite für die Verehrung des Metal – und gehobenen Mumpitz. Jüngst ist sein siebtes Buch „Hard, Heavy & Happy“ auf der SPIEGEL-Bestseller-Liste gelandet. Er ist Kolumnist für die Magazine WirtschaftsWoche und Business Punk. 2017 konnte er am Rande eine Veranstaltung ein verwackeltes Selfie mit Bruce Dickinson machen, was selbstverständlich alle anderen Errungenschaften vollumfänglich in den Schatten stellt. Der eingefleischte Metalfan lebt mit seiner Frau, zwei Kindern und zwei Katzen in Hamm, dem laut TAZ „dunkelsten Loch in Westfalen“.

Der eingefleischte Metalfan lebt mit seiner Frau, zwei Kindern und zwei Katzen in Hamm, dem laut TAZ „dunkelsten Loch in Westfalen“.

What does it feel like to be a metal fan? How does the music affect us emotionally? What do we do with our music? And how does metal help us to lead a happy – or sometimes: a little less unhappy – life? Dr. Nico Rose answers these questions in his bestselling book “Hard, Heavy & Happy”.

During this special 90-minute reading, Nico will be accompanied on stage by the band “Acoustic Steel”. Together, they will present a sophisticated, choreographed program, a unique blend of literature and music. You are invited to laugh, to cry – as well as to sing along and celebrate.
assets.subtitle: Hard, Heavy & Happy - Lesung

title: "Hard, Heavy & Happy": Die lauteste Lesung aller Zeiten - Dr. Nico Rose feat. Acoustic Steele

assets.biography:
Zu den Büchern „Kumpels in Kutten 1+2+3“:

Heavy Metal: Kein Musikstil passt wohl besser zu den Menschen im Ruhrpott. Als Anfang der 80er Jahre ein Haufen Jugendlicher ihren Idolen aus Großbritannien und Kalifornien nacheiferte, hätte wohl niemand damit gerechnet, dass daraus eine Szene werden würde, die bis heute immer größer wird. Das Ruhrgebiet ist nach wie vor das Zentrum des deutschen Metals. Nicht nur Kreator, Sodom, Grave Digger, Rage, Axel Rudi Pell & Co. haben hier ihre Wurzeln, sondern auch die Plattenlabels Drakkar und Century Media oder das Rock Hard Magazin. Das Buch „Kumpels in Kutten“ erzählt die Geschichte dieser einzigartigen Szene von den 80er Jahren bis in die Gegenwart.

Holger Schmenk und Andreas Schiffmann (u.a. Rock Hard) arbeiten zurzeit am dritten Band von Kumpels in Kutten, der im Herbst 2023 erscheinen soll, und interviewen quer durch die Metal-Szene Musiker, Label-Chefs, Produzenten & Co., denn seit 2010 bzw. 2017 hat sich einiges getan ...

Die Autoren:

Holger Schmenk , Dr. phil., Historiker, wurde 1978 in Oberhausen geboren und lebt inzwischen in der Nähe von Marburg. Er studierte Geschichte, Germanistik sowie Erziehungswissenschaften und promovierte über die Stadtgeschichte Xantens im 19. Jahrhundert. Nach Zwischenstation als Wissenschaftlicher Mitarbeiter an den Universitäten Duisburg-Essen und Siegen arbeitet er aktuell als Schulleiter. Seit 2008 beschäftigt er sich als Autor mit der Metal-Szene im Ruhrgebiet, woraus „Kumpels in Kutten“ hervorging.

Der gebürtige Saarländer Andreas Schiffmann ist Magister Artium der Germanistik und Anglistik, studierter Journalist sowie Bürokaufmann, dem niemand seine Buchhaltung anvertrauen sollte. Er übersetzt seit mehr als fünfzehn Jahren Belletristik und Sachbücher, schreibt für diverse Online- und Printmagazine über Musik, dilettiert sowohl in Fotografie als auch im Bassspiel und hat ansonsten ebenfalls kaum mehr im Kopf als die ‚großen‘ Künste, die längst nicht mehr für Geschäfts- oder Karrieremodelle taugen.

Even if we all think about ourselves as “Kumpels in Kutten”, there are places in this Heavy-Metal-Bundesrepublik, that are more metal than others. While Essen was announced cultural-capital of Europe in 2010, Holger Schmenk and Christian Krumm decided to document their cities history of Metal music. They will tell some funny, tragic, forgotten or even well-known tales and paint a true and real picture of the Ruhrgebiet.
assets.subtitle: Lesung mit Holger Schmenk/Christian Krumm

assets.biography: You can’t think about the Kabel1 evening program without thinking about those two never tired adventure-junkies. Now it is time they’ll enter our Wacken Open Air. You always wanted to talk about DIY-stuff with Konny or discuss the latest travel-route with Manu? There you go. Metal included, understood.
assets.subtitle: Sabbelstunde

assets.biography:
20 Jahre Mambo Kurt
Kult – Kultiger – Mambo Kult !

Es war im Jahre 1977 als der junge Mambo seine damals hoch moderne Heimorgel unterm Weihnachtsbaum fand. U¨berwa¨ltigt von diesem Hightech-Instrument tra¨umte er von einer Karriere als Superstar. Leider holte ihn die harte Realita¨t schnell ein und ihm wurde klar, dass im Rock ‘n’ Roll Business kein Platz fu¨r eine Heimorgel war. So ließ er das gute Stu¨ck ab Mitte der 80er auf dem Dachboden verstauben. Aus dem Nichts fragte dann im Jahre 1997 eine damals angesagte Hip-Hop-Disco an, ob Mambo nicht im Rahmen eines Trash-Abends Heimorgel spielen ko¨nnte…. Wie Bitte? Heimorgel in der Hip-Hop-Disco ?
Ganz klar – Mambo wollte auf die Bu¨hne, nur nicht so wie man es von ihm erwartet ha¨tte….
Kurzer Hand schmiedete er u¨ber Nacht einen Plan und zweckentfremdete das Instrument, um seinen Helden nacheifern zu ko¨nnen. Er hatte schon damals keine Scheu vor musikalischen Grenzen und interpretierte die Hits seiner Helden wie AC/DC, Dr. Alban oder Rage against the Machine auf seiner heiß geliebten Heimorgel.

Erst in den Tagen danach realisierte Mambo, dass er etwas Außergewo¨hnliches geschaffen haben musste, denn die Szene war hellauf begeistert. Mambos Neuinterpretationen auf der Heimorgel klangen besser als die Originale. Singen konnte Mambo zwar nicht, aber das war ihm und dem Publikum egal! Bei soviel Heimorgelpower ist ein bisschen schiefer Gesang reine Nebensache und aktuelle Chart-Hits auf einer Heimorgel nachzuspielen war sowieso eine absolute Weltpremiere!

Der Rest ist Legende: Schnell gab es einen Major-Deal bei einer großen Plattenfirma und ein Engagement bei RTL. Mambo Kurt zelebrierte die hohe Kunst des Weglassens und Nichtsingenko¨nnens und entwickelte den Trash-Hype der Jahrtausendwende mit. Es dauerte nicht lange bis er auch die Hauptbu¨hnen der großen Festivals bestieg und sich allein mit seiner Orgel vor 45.000 Zuschauern wiederfand. 2004 spielte er zum ersten Mal in Wacken und entwickelte sich dort schnell zum Maskottchen des gro¨ßten Metal-Festivals der Welt. Von Skurrilita¨t getrieben ersetzte er nebenbei die Showband in der SWR Latenight Show , spielte auf Kreuzfahrt-Dampfern, erklomm einen 3.500m hohen Gipfel in den franzo¨sischen Alpen, um die Snowboardszene zu beglu¨cken und revolutionierte mit Team Rhythmusgymnastik den Ko¨lner Karneval – immer getreu seinem Motto :

Umso absurder – Umso Besser
Alle wollen sie ihn sehen – den Orgelgott !!!

Heute – 20 Jahre nach seinem ersten Bu¨hnenauftritt – begibt sich Mambo auf die lange Reise zu sich selbst. Er versucht zu verstehen, was eigentlich passiert ist….
Er resu¨miert, schreibt ein Buch, reist durch die Republik und besucht bekannte Ku¨nstler zum Kaffeeklatsch,
gemeinsamen Musizieren und Philosophieren.

20 Jahre Heimorgel-Kult – Was war da passiert?
So richtig kann Mambo es selbst nicht verstehen, aber es gibt eine SPANNENDE Geschichte zu erza¨hlen!!!
In seiner Jubila¨ums-Show nimmt uns Mambo mit auf seine ganz perso¨nliche Reise.
Er erza¨hlt, singt, liest, tanzt und orgelt durch 20 Jahre Heimorgel-Kult.
Der Weg vom kleinen Mambo zum Terminator der Alleinunterhalter! Lassen Sie sich von dieser einmaligen Interaktiven-Action-Abenteuer-Musik-Show verzaubern und werden Sie Zeitzeuge, wie ein la¨ngst vergessenes Musikinstrument (das es aktuell bei Ebay schon fu¨r 1 € gibt) einen Konzertsaal zum Brennen bringt …..

Sie werden es nicht bereuen.

Von Skurrilita¨t getrieben ersetzte er nebenbei die Showband in der SWR Latenight Show , spielte auf Kreuzfahrt-Dampfern, erklomm einen 3.500m hohen Gipfel in den franzo¨sischen Alpen, um die Snowboardszene zu beglu¨cken und revolutionierte mit Team Rhythmusgymnastik den Ko¨lner Karneval – immer getreu seinem Motto :

Umso absurder – Umso Besser
Alle wollen sie ihn sehen – den Orgelgott !!!

Heute – 20 Jahre nach seinem ersten Bu¨hnenauftritt – begibt sich Mambo auf die lange Reise zu sich selbst. Er versucht zu verstehen, was eigentlich passiert ist….
Er resu¨miert, schreibt ein Buch, reist durch die Republik und besucht bekannte Ku¨nstler zum Kaffeeklatsch,
gemeinsamen Musizieren und Philosophieren.

20 Jahre Heimorgel-Kult – Was war da passiert?
So richtig kann Mambo es selbst nicht verstehen, aber es gibt eine SPANNENDE Geschichte zu erza¨hlen!!!
In seiner Jubila¨ums-Show nimmt uns Mambo mit auf seine ganz perso¨nliche Reise.
Er erza¨hlt, singt, liest, tanzt und orgelt durch 20 Jahre Heimorgel-Kult.
Der Weg vom kleinen Mambo zum Terminator der Alleinunterhalter! Lassen Sie sich von dieser einmaligen Interaktiven-Action-Abenteuer-Musik-Show verzaubern und werden Sie Zeitzeuge, wie ein la¨ngst vergessenes Musikinstrument (das es aktuell bei Ebay schon fu¨r 1 € gibt) einen Konzertsaal zum Brennen bringt …..

Sie werden es nicht bereuen.

20 Jahre Mambo Kurt
Kult – Kultiger – Mambo Kult !

Es war im Jahre 1977 als der junge Mambo seine damals hoch moderne Heimorgel unterm Weihnachtsbaum fand. U¨berwa¨ltigt von diesem Hightech-Instrument tra¨umte er von einer Karriere als Superstar. Leider holte ihn die harte Realita¨t schnell ein und ihm wurde klar, dass im Rock ‘n’ Roll Business kein Platz fu¨r eine Heimorgel war. So ließ er das gute Stu¨ck ab Mitte der 80er auf dem Dachboden verstauben. Aus dem Nichts fragte dann im Jahre 1997 eine damals angesagte Hip-Hop-Disco an, ob Mambo nicht im Rahmen eines Trash-Abends Heimorgel spielen ko¨nnte…. Wie Bitte? Heimorgel in der Hip-Hop-Disco ?
Ganz klar – Mambo wollte auf die Bu¨hne, nur nicht so wie man es von ihm erwartet ha¨tte….
Kurzer Hand schmiedete er u¨ber Nacht einen Plan und zweckentfremdete das Instrument, um seinen Helden nacheifern zu ko¨nnen. Er hatte schon damals keine Scheu vor musikalischen Grenzen und interpretierte die Hits seiner Helden wie AC/DC, Dr. Alban oder Rage against the Machine auf seiner heiß geliebten Heimorgel.

Erst in den Tagen danach realisierte Mambo, dass er etwas Außergewo¨hnliches geschaffen haben musste, denn die Szene war hellauf begeistert. Mambos Neuinterpretationen auf der Heimorgel klangen besser als die Originale. Singen konnte Mambo zwar nicht, aber das war ihm und dem Publikum egal! Bei soviel Heimorgelpower ist ein bisschen schiefer Gesang reine Nebensache und aktuelle Chart-Hits auf einer Heimorgel nachzuspielen war sowieso eine absolute Weltpremiere!

Der Rest ist Legende: Schnell gab es einen Major-Deal bei einer großen Plattenfirma und ein Engagement bei RTL. Mambo Kurt zelebrierte die hohe Kunst des Weglassens und Nichtsingenko¨nnens und entwickelte den Trash-Hype der Jahrtausendwende mit. Es dauerte nicht lange bis er auch die Hauptbu¨hnen der großen Festivals bestieg und sich allein mit seiner Orgel vor 45.000 Zuschauern wiederfand. 2004 spielte er zum ersten Mal in Wacken und entwickelte sich dort schnell zum Maskottchen des gro¨ßten Metal-Festivals der Welt. Von Skurrilita¨t getrieben ersetzte er nebenbei die Showband in der SWR Latenight Show , spielte auf Kreuzfahrt-Dampfern, erklomm einen 3.500m hohen Gipfel in den franzo¨sischen Alpen, um die Snowboardszene zu beglu¨cken und revolutionierte mit Team Rhythmusgymnastik den Ko¨lner Karneval – immer getreu seinem Motto :

Umso absurder – Umso Besser
Alle wollen sie ihn sehen – den Orgelgott !!!

Er resu¨miert, schreibt ein Buch, reist durch die Republik und besucht bekannte Ku¨nstler zum Kaffeeklatsch,
gemeinsamen Musizieren und Philosophieren.

20 Jahre Heimorgel-Kult – Was war da passiert?
So richtig kann Mambo es selbst nicht verstehen, aber es gibt eine SPANNENDE Geschichte zu erza¨hlen!!!
In seiner Jubila¨ums-Show nimmt uns Mambo mit auf seine ganz perso¨nliche Reise.
Er erza¨hlt, singt, liest, tanzt und orgelt durch 20 Jahre Heimorgel-Kult.
Der Weg vom kleinen Mambo zum Terminator der Alleinunterhalter! Lassen Sie sich von dieser einmaligen Interaktiven-Action-Abenteuer-Musik-Show verzaubern und werden Sie Zeitzeuge, wie ein la¨ngst vergessenes Musikinstrument (das es aktuell bei Ebay schon fu¨r 1 € gibt) einen Konzertsaal zum Brennen bringt …..

Sie werden es nicht bereuen.

Mambo Kurt liebt oder hasst man, dazwischen dürfte es nur wenig geben. Ich zähle mich ohne rot zu werden zu den Menschen, die den Orgelgott abfeiern. "King Of Heimorgel" ist nunmehr das sechste Studioalbum des einzigartigen Alleinunterhalters und es gibt wie immer einzig und allein den Sound seiner Electone D85 Heimorgel und seinen unvergleichlichen Gesang zu hören. Der Gesang ist nach objektiven Standpunkten natürlich wieder unglaublich beschissen, aber gerade das macht eine Mambo Kurt Platte doch aus. Dieses teils unglaublich neben der Spur liegende, aber doch nie uninspiriert wirkende Genöle... herrlich. Nicht unerwähnt bleiben darf natürlich der Gastgesang von Orgellehrerin Heidi Schulz, die mal wieder noch schlechter singt, als der Chef selbst (man höre sich "Rhythm Is A Dancer" an!!!). Am Konzept hat sich, Gott sei Dank nichts geändert. Mambo interpretiert Hits aus Rock, Pop und Metal auf seine ihm unnachahmliche Art und Weise auf...? natürlich der Heimorgel. Ob Motörheads "Ace Of Spades", Lady Gagas "Pokerface" oder System Of A Downs "Chop Suey", hier ist nichts sicher; heilig aber schon, denn man merkt den Stücken allesamt an, dass stets mit dem nötigen Respekt an sie heran gegangen wurde. Vanilla Ice' "Ice Ice Baby" klingt in der Orgelversion sogar wesentlich cooler als im Original. Mehr Titel möchte ich aber bewusst nicht verraten, ist das Schmunzeln doch noch größer, wenn die Songs überraschend kommen. "King Of Heimorgel" ist auf jeden Fall erneut ein Pflichtkauf für alle Fans schräger Coverversionen. Fans des Meisters müssen sowieso zuschlagen. (Rezension: David Lang)

Was erwartet den geneigten Zuschauer live? Ein Alleinunterhalter mit einer Heimorgel spielt Coverversionen von Songs, die man nie an einer Heimorgel erwartet hätte. Hardrock- und Popklassiker erhalten einen ganz eigenen Stil und es groovt gewaltig. Die Heimorgel fährt mit ihren herrlichen Plastiksounds sofort in das Tanzbein und macht Mambo-Kurt-Fans von den ersten Takten an glücklich. Dazu kommen manchmal sinnentleerte, manchmal aber auch hochgeistige Zwischeneinlagen des Meisters, es fiept, es rockt. Weltspitzenklasse. Mambo ist der einzige, bei dem nach „Slayer“ „Dr. Alban“ kommen darf, und nach „Abba“ „Rage against the Machine“, ohne dass irgendjemand an der Richtigkeit zweifeln würde. Ein Mambo-Kurt-Konzert ist erst dann gelungen, wenn es ein Stagediving und eine Polonaise gab, und bis jetzt hat es immer geklappt.

Mambo Kurt war 1982 westdeutscher Meister im Heimorgelspielen in der Altersgruppe der bis 14jährigen. Ende der 90er bot er zum ersten Mal im kleinen Kreis Coversongs auf der Heimorgel dar. Sofort fand sich in Heavy-Metal Kreisen eine große Fangemeinde, da Mambo eine Vorliebe für Rocksongs hat. Legendär ist seine „Enter Sandman“ Version als Walzer. Der Trash-Hype der Jahrtausendwende spülte Mambo ins TV, zu RTL und VIVA2, um genau zu sein. Es folgte ein Engagement am Schauspielhaus Hannover in 2003 und eine Komponistentätigkeit für ARTE. Im Jahre 2006 war Mambo als Fanbotschafter für die ARD bei der FIFA WM unterwegs. Als Vorsitzender der deutsch-holländischen Fussballfreundschaft, brachte er das Kunststück fertig, jeweils eine WM-Single in Deutschland und Holland zu veröffentlichen. 2005 war Mambo der Moderator von „Rock-Guerilla“ bei „ROCKHARD“. Seit 2006 ist Mambo Kurt einmal die Woche als kleinste Studioband der Welt in der SWR latenight Show im TV zu sehen. 2011 bespasste er „STERN-TV“ auf RTL und Sondersendungen zu Grandprix und Frauen-WM im ZDF.

Der Terminator unter den Alleinunterhaltern is back, Mambo trennt die Massen schneller als Moses das Meer, liebt ihn oder hasst ihn. Er ist der „King of Heimorgel“.

Can you recall your life at 20? University or your first big love? Mambo Kurt, only and undisputed king of the “Heimorgel”, organs your ears at the W:O:A since 20 years. Time to say “Thank You”. We’re looking forward to a very special set in the sign of this anniversary. Slayer, ABBA or Van Halen – doesn’t matter, because they are all part of the maestros oeuvre. There will be only an end until a polonaise is making it’s way through the crowd and the stage got hit by numerous stagedives. Long live Mambo Kurt

ALIEN ROCKIN’ EXPLOSION (A.R.E) is much more than a rock band. They are the perfect blend between the Universe of comic and everything that made 70’s hard rock big. Its female voice, the vital importance of its illustrations and the genuine sound that only greatest bands have, are intermixed to create their own style: “Comics & Rock from outer space“.

“We A.R.E here!!” (Rock Estatal Records, 2017) is A.R.E’s debut album on planet Earth. Nine hard’n’heavy songs full of cheerful and optimistic lyrics and an energetic breath of fresh air.

“Alien Rockin’ Explosion and the golden record” (Apache Libros, 2018) is an 80-page full color comic that tells the story of these crazy aliens that came to planet Earth to find out how to become Rock Stars. Lots of fun, adventure and a sincere tribute to rock history.

This is the third time in a row for ALIEN ROCKIN’ EXPLOSION as MASCHINE’S LATE NIGHT SHOW rock band in W:O:A. They A.R.E mad, they A.R.E aliens and they A.R.E rock!

This is the third time in a row for ALIEN ROCKIN’ EXPLOSION as MASCHINE’S LATE NIGHT SHOW rock band in W:O:A. They A.R.E mad, they A.R.E aliens and they A.R.E rock!

For the fifth time in a row, the Aliens invade W:O:A with their infectious rock and contagious enthusiasm.

ALIEN ROCKIN ’EXPLOSION is a multidisciplinary and transmedia project that unites music, plastic arts and science fiction, creating its own style: Comics & Rock from outer space.

Original and energetic, Alien Rockin' Explosion alternates their presence in comic and science fiction events, with live shows in rock halls. Since 2017, they are also the resident band of Maschine’s Late Night Show (linked to WACKEN OPEN AIR universe) where they bring a special set full of fun rock & metal classics.

To date they’ve published two studio albums (“We A.R.E here!!!”, Rock Estatal Records, 2017 and “Paint it green“, Lady Stone Records, 2020), two books (a comic titled “Alien Rockin’ Explosion and the golden record“, Apache Libros 2018 and the graphic novel “Crónicas de la Rocksistencia“, Apache Libros 2022), and many comic strips during 3 years in La Heavy Spanish metal magazine.

In their stories and lyrics, the alien foursome narrates their adventures on planet Earth from a critical point of view but without losing the optimism and good humour that characterizes them.

They ARE:
Red-Trysha: vocals, backing vocals & harmonic
Van Halien: guitars, ukelele & backing vocals
Mazzurg: drums, percussion & backing vocals
Sandreitor: bass, spoons & backing vocals

Comics & Rock From Outer Space. Comics & Rock From Outer Space! COMICS & ROCK FROM OUTER SPACE! If you are still here: Congrats, you found Alien Rockin’ Explosion and their mood-lifting Hard-Rock from another dimension. These four extraterrestrials are regulars on Wacken stages and therefore are the Spock to our Kirk. Fascinating!

Who needs a Stefan Raab comeback as long as we got Maschine? Outfit-wise our moderation-Metalhead doesn’t need to fear the colonial “Jeck”. On every other hand Maschines Late Night Show doesn’t have much in common with a polished production either. Everything is authentic in here. And it’s Metal! That’s why you get our “Order to check in!”

Seid dabei, wenn W:O:A Moderator Maschine zusammen mit seiner Late Night Band Alien Rockin Explosion und illustren Gästen jeden Abend die Erlebnisse auf dem W:O:A Revue passieren lässt. Montag und Dienstag wird dies im Landgasthof zur Post in Wacken geschehen, ab Mittwoch dann im Welcome To The Jungle.

Aber was ist denn nun die Late Night Show? Kurz: Durch Improvisation und Witz modifizierter Firlefanz im besten Sinne des Wortes. Die respektvoll-respektlose Moderation schmeichelt nicht nur der Sensationsgier satter Medienkonsumenten, nein auch hochkarätige Gäste und der Rest sind begeistert. Interviews, welche in eben diesem Sinne geführt werden, bereichern die Show durch profane Information und geschickt herbei geführte Abschweifungen in andere Universen und Absurditäten. Schnaps und Spiele für Gäste, Zuschauer und den Moderator! Ein sich bestätigender Selbsttest mit Publikum bietet dem moderativ-behüteten Zuschauer Unterhaltung der Extraklasse im lahm gewordenen Selbstdarstellungszirkus der Moderne. Manege frei…

They have been named the missing link between “Einstürzende Neubauten” and bands like “Nine Inch Nails” or “Ministry”. Black Tish, formed in Belgium in 1988, released their debut in 2023 and are now ready to show the world what they’re made of. Together with “Moth Quantum” they provide the Holy Ground with a true world-premiere. Be there or be square!

Like an unholy shadow, dark wings creep over Berlin, while a foggy mist slowly invades a sleeping wall of Marshall amps. The air is filled with the smell of blood and dark leather – The cult is awake! And it’s name is Bloodfang. Somewhere between Venom, Motörhead and a certain punkishness they cemented their own musical nightmare: It is Black’n’Roll it is  Doom Metal on speed and Punk with a metallic feeling. It is Hell’s Rock’n’Roll.

Join in the cult before it’s too late!

BLIND MAN‘S GUN ist die Band aus dem Hamburger Untergrund und spielt knallharten Heavy Rock und Metal, ohne sich vom Mainstream beeinflussen zu lassen. Englische Texte werden mal in stampfenden Rockbeats, schweren Heavy-Riffs oder auch in balladesken Stücken verpackt. Heavy Riffs treffen auf melodischen Gesang und nehmen einen unvorhersehbaren Lauf. Genau das ist das Markenzeichen dieser Band, immer wieder für musikalische Überraschungen zu sorgen, ohne ihrem Stil untreu zu werden. Durchgeknallte, subtil obszöne und auch nachdenklich stimmende Texte schießen mal mit & mal quer quasiparallel zu den instrumentalen Ergüssen. 2011 war das Jahr ihrer Bandgründung und sie beschlossen, dass der Wahnsinn, der in ihren Köpfen herrschte, raus musste. Ihre Musik ist ehrlich, emotional und nimmt kein Blatt vor den Mund!

Bild @ Lunapics

KrashKarmacan easily be described as metal’s most accomplished duo. From behind the drum kit the energetic Niki Skistimas keeps the rhythm rock-tight as she delivers her seductively-charged vocals; meanwhile, guitarist/bassist and co-vocalist Ralf Dietel brings the material to life with his unique Frankenstein guitar/bass creation. Never before have two people created a sound so immense yet so vibrant.
The heaviest and wildest karaoke you'll ever get to see!

Das Wacken-Urgestein! Seit der ersten Ausgabe gehören Skyline zum Open Air, selbst wenn Organisator Thomas Jensen nicht mehr die Saiten des Tieftöners zupft. Dass sie euch mit ihren Covern von Evergreens unterhalten werden, steht also ganz außer Frage.
